business.headline: Nishant Pitti resigns as Easy Trip Planners CEO after divesting stakeIn a stock exchange filing, Nishant Pitti cited personal reasons for stepping down as the CEO of Easy Trip Planners.

IREDA share price: Multibagger stock jumps 8% today. Here's why IREDA's share price touched an intraday high of Rs 227.65 on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), marking a 5.76% increase from its previous close.

Explained: Why SJVN share price rose 8% today SJVN shares were trading at Rs 110.33 as of 11 AM on the National Stock Exchange (NSE). The sharp rise in the stock was accompanied by heavy trading volumes, with over two crore shares changing hands.

Adani Wilmar stocks recover as share price rises 5% in ealry tradeAdani Wilmar share price: The recovery follows a sharp decline of 7% on Tuesday after Adani Enterprises Ltd (AEL) announced its decision to sell its entire 44% stake in Adani Wilmar Ltd (AWL).

Are BSE, NSE closed on January 1 for New year 2025?In India, the stock markets operate from Monday to Friday and remain closed on weekends, i.e., Saturdays and Sundays.

Stock market today: Sensex, Nifty open flat in first trading session of 2025The S&P BSE Sensex was up by 33.99 points to 78,173.00, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 1.85 points to 23,646.65 as of 9:31 AM.
What is Kekius Maximus? Elon Musk's new identity on XBy adopting the name 'Kekius Maximus' on X, Musk sent the KEKIUS memecoin soaring 500%, sparking renewed interest in the crypto market.
Sensex, Nifty end marginally lower in last trading session of 2024The S&P BSE Sensex fell by 109.12 points to settle at 78,139.01, while the Nifty50 edged down by 0.10 points, closing at 23,644.80.

Sensex and Nifty in 2025: Will Dalal Street's turbulent run continue?Following a volatile 2024 that saw significant gains in the first half before moderating, market experts anticipate single-digit returns in the coming year.

ITR filing deadline extended for belated/revised return. Check all detailsUnion Minister of State for Finance Pankaj Chaudhary recently revealed in Parliament that only 6.68% of India's population filed ITRs in the fiscal year 2023-24.

Looking to invest in stocks in 2025? 9 picks for your portfolio this New YearThe year 2024 has been decent for Indian stock markets. Both key market indices - the NSE Nifty 50 and the S&P BSE Sensex - went up by 9% during the year.

Income Tax extends Vivad Se Vishwas deadline to January 31. Key penalty detailsThe Income Tax Department has extended the Vivad Se Vishwas Scheme deadline to January 31, 2025, offering taxpayers a chance to settle disputes at reduced rates.

Dam Capital share price rebounds after Monday's slump. Here's whyDam Capital stock price:  By 11 am, the shares were trading 3.60% higher at Rs 385.70, recovering some ground lost during Monday's profit booking.

ITI share price hits record high as positive rally continuesITI share price: The recent rally has propelled ITI Ltd. above its 5-day, 20-day, 50-day, 100-day, and 200-day moving averages, underlining its robust performance across short- and long-term benchmarks.
Explained: Why Easy Trip Planners shares tanked 10% today The shares hit a low of Rs 15.42 on the NSE, a decline of 9.51%. The stock saw a turnover of Rs 127.43 crore on the NSE during the session.

Unimech Aerospace IPO listing: Shares make bumper debut. Lists at 90% premiumUnimech Aerospace IPO stock: Unimech Aerospace shares listed at Rs 1,491 per share, reflecting an 89.94% premium over their issue price on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).
Sensex, Nifty drop as IT stocks weigh on markets in last session of 2024The S&P BSE Sensex lost 392.61 points to 77,855.52, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 107.80 points to 23,537.10 as of 9:28 AM.

It includes a fresh issue of 86 lakh shares, amounting to Rs 184.90 crore, and an offer for sale (OFS) of 35 lakh shares, valued at Rs 75.25 crore.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Arvind Kejriwal writes to Mohan Bhagwat on BJP's 'wrongdoings', party hits backArvind Kejriwal wrote to the RSS chief questioning the BJP's actions, while the BJP responded by advising Kejriwal to stop lying and make truthful promises in New Year.

Delhi bakery owner dies by suicide amid dispute over divorce, business with wifePuneet Khurana co-owned the bakery with his wife. The couple, who married in 2016, were in the middle of getting a divorce and a dispute arose in connection with their business.

Just not on: Ex-cricketers shocked by dressing room leaks from Australia TestsFormer cricketers, including Irfan Pathan, have condemned the leaks from the Indian dressing room during the Border-Gavaskar Trophy, following a news report about Gautam Gambhir's stern address to the team after their Boxing Day Test defeat. The controversy has added to the mounting pressure on the Indian team, which trails 1-2 in the series.

'Enlighten us': Kunal Kamra questions Blinkit CEO over wages of delivery partnersComedian Kunal Kamra questioned Blinkit co-founder and CEO Albinder Dhindsa regarding the average wages paid to delivery agents last year.
The Gen Beta era is here. What will define their journey?Children of younger millennials and older Gen Z, Gen Beta will be born into a world dominated by technology and AI.

BJP lists Arvind Kejriwal's 'ten failed promises', questions AAP's 'credibility'The BJP accused Arvind Kejriwal of failing to fulfil key promises, including lowering power tariffs, providing clean water, improving healthcare and education, and cleaning the Yamuna, even after a decade in power.

Man kills mother, 4 sisters at hotel after serving them alcohol on New Year's EveArshad was arrested after he allegedly murdered his mother along with his four sisters over a family dispute on New Year's Eve.

Meet India's best-selling electric car for 3rd straight monthThis electric car has recorded total sales of over 10,000 units in three months, beating all the models from Tata, Mahindra, Hyundai, Citroen and BYD.

Virat Kohli exit plan: Ex-cricketer urges BCCI to be prepared for transitionFormer India medium pacer Atul Wassan emphasised the importance of preparing the Test team for a smooth transition, urging the BCCI to establish a clear succession plan for Virat Kohli. Kohli's place in the side has come under scrutiny following his lack of impactful performances in Australia.

Biren Singh's 'past sins' barb after Congress asks 'why PM can't visit Manipur'On Tuesday, the Manipur Chief Minister expressed regret and said he wanted to "say sorry to the people of the state for what has been happening since May 3, 2023", in reference to the ethnic violence.

Blake Lively sues Justin Baldoni over 'mental pain, anguish and emotional distress'Blake Lively has taken legal action against her It Ends With Us co-actor Justin Baldoni, citing "severe emotional distress". The lawsuit also includes claims of "mental pain, anguish, and lost wages".

What a joke: FIDE slammed after Carlsen, Nepomniachtchi share World Blitz crownGrandmasters Magnus Carlsen and Ian Nepomniachtchi made history by sharing the 2024 World Blitz Chess Championship title in New York. Carlsen proposed the tie, which Nepomniachtchi accepted, eliciting mixed reactions from the chess community.

Ileana D'Cruz expecting 2nd child? Actor's New Year post sparks speculationIleana D'Cruz is expecting her second child with Michael Dolan. The actor shared a video on social media that hinted to fans about the good news.

FBI seizes largest cache of homemade bombs in its history from Virginia farmAccording to court documents, FBI agents found more than 150 pipe bombs and other explosive devices while raiding a 20-acre property in Virginia's Isle of Wight county on December 17.

, during a 17 December raid on a 20-acre property in Isle of Wight county

How Millennials and Gen Z can balance spending and financial securityMillennials and Gen Z, comprising over 52 percent of India's population, are redefining financial priorities with a focus on experiences, flexibility, and passions. To secure their future, they must adopt smart financial strategies tailored to their dynamic lifestyles.

Atishi claims Lt Governor ordered temple demolition, he calls it 'cheap politics'Refuting the Chief Minister's allegations, the Lieutenant Governor's office issued a statement saying that no religious structures or any temples, mosques, churches were being demolished.

Telugu producer breaks silence after backlash for 'disrespecting' Boney KapoorTelugu producer Naga Vamsi received severe backlash from celebrities and the Internet for 'disrespecting' Boney Kapoor in a roundtable. He explained that they had a healthy discussion.
In pics: From Paris to Mumbai, 2025 welcomed with grand celebrations, fireworksHappy New Year 2025: People across the world welcome New Year in great pomp.

Delhi welcomes 2025 with dip in temperature, relief from cold likely from FridayDense fog and biting cold grip Delhi as 2025 begins, disrupting flights and commutes. Dense fog prompted Delhi airport to implement Category III-complaint for flight operations due to low visibility.

Indian-origin man jailed in Singapore for making racist remarksA 27-year-old Indian-origin man, Rishi David Ramesh Nandwani, has been sentenced to four weeks in jail and fined SGD 4,000 for hurling racial slurs and throwing a tip box at a cashier in a cafe in Singapore's Holland Village.

How dynasties, sultanates and empires kept Delhi a power centre for centuriesFor centuries, even before the British arrived in India, Delhi was the centre of power in the region. From the Tomars, who were the first rulers of Delhi, and the Chauhans to the Sultans and the Mughals, all recognised the significance of what is now India's capital. Here's a glimpse into Delhi's 1,000-year journey of evolution.

Man pushes commuter onto New York subway tracks, charged with attempted murderThe accused, identified as 23-year-old Kamel Hawkins, was charged with attempted murder and second-degree assault for pushing the commuter onto the tracks in New York City's 18th Street station on Tuesday.

Squid Game 3 to release in 2025, Leonardo DiCaprio to do cameo in Netflix series?Days after the release of Squid Game 2, Netflix announced that Squid Game 3 will release in summer of 2025. Reportedly, Leonardo DiCaprio might play a cameo in Season 3.

No one can stop our reunification: Xi Jinping warns Taiwan in New Year's speechIn the past year, Beijing has stepped up military pressure near Taiwan, sending warships and planes almost daily into the waters and air space around the island in what Taiwanese officials view as a creeping effort to "normalise" China's military presence.

Video: Rajinikanth wishes fans Happy New Year, waves and blows flying kissesSuperstar Rajinikanth greeted his fans who were waiting for him outside his Poes Garden residence in Chennai. He waved to his fans, blew flying kisses and wished them Happy New Year.

Anurag Kashyap criticises Shankar's 'reel-like' approach to Game ChangerAnurag Kashyap critiqued Shankar's reel-like approach to his upcoming film Game Changer. He warned filmmakers against sacrificing creativity for audience expectations.

For the first time in over a decade, the team faces a transition phase, with questions looming over the futures of senior players.

Aryna Sabalenka responds with cheeky remarkWorld No.1 Aryna Sabalenka spoke about her camaraderie with Poland's Iga Swiatek and gave a cheeky response about featuring in TikTok videos with her. Sabalenka is currently plying her trade in the Brisbane International where she defeated Renata Zarazua in the first round.

R Ashwin reacts to Jamie Overton's non-striker run-out warning in BBL gameBig Bash League: R Ashwin was thrilled at Jamie Overton's attempt to run out a batter at the non-striker's end during a Big Bash League match. Ashwin and Overton will play for Chennai Super Kings in IPl 2025.

Jasprit Bumrah named captain, Cummins ignored in Australian media's Test Team of 2024India fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah was named the captain of the Test team of the year by the Australian media but captain Pat Cummins failed to find any spot.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
